column1: 22540,Captain Britain and MI: 13 (2008) #7,7,22185,95,"Brian Braddock has to make his hardest decision ever, in the room that grants your heart's desire.  The power behind the Mindless Ones is revealed.  Blade and Spitfire: at each other's throats?  And our heroes have to fight their way out of: Hell Comes to Birmingham, part two.,2008,11
